page.title: 14CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content:
a party.
{THE GARDENING SOCIETY The Gardening Society is a flourishing group of people who meet regularly and put on 3 shows a year.As well as enjoying the social occasions,they open their gardens to the public and make visits to other gardens.Children take part in these shows and we are looking forward to this year's summer show soon to take place.
{THE ART CLUB The Art Club was started in 1980 by an elderly lady.She thought it would be a good idea for a tracher to help a group of amateur artists.The group grew in number and people met for social reasons as well.Sadly the elderly lady died but the group continued to grow.Each individual
